|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Lantiq;PEF 7071V; |eth3chip = Lantiq;PEF 7071V; |sw1chip = Lantiq;PSB 6972;XWAY™ TANTOS (PSB 6972 V V1.3); |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 90:01:3B |oui = 90:01:3B |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL2+ |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = BTHub3-XXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^BTHub3-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = RTA4525W-D31 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9227; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [http://forum.kitz.co.uk/index.php?topic=10935.0 Inside the BT Business Hub 3.0 - post by ''asbokid'' on forum.kitz.co.uk] :This device has a '''Sagemcom''' OUI. :However, the board P/Ns clearly indicate '''Askey''' manufacture. There are two Gigabit Ethernet ports on this device.
This includes the red WAN port and the right most port on the LAN switch. This device appears to be mostly identical to the [[BT Home Hub 3.0A]]. :This device is assumed to use AR9227. [[Category:English Documentation]]
